control.name: Lenze.UI.AlarmLine.Custom.Default
control.title: AlarmLine
control.description: An alarm line showing up when a set alarm class is active.

property.name: width
property.description: Gets or sets the Width option.

property.name: minWidth
property.description: Gets or sets the MinWidth option.

property.name: maxWidth
property.description: Gets or sets the MaxWidth option.

property.name: height
property.description: Gets or sets the Height option.

property.name: minHeight
property.description: Gets or sets the MinHeight option.

property.name: maxHeight
property.description: Gets or sets the MaxHeight option.

property.name: padding
property.description: Gets or sets the Padding option.

property.description: Gets or sets the BorderWidth option.

property.description: Gets or sets the BorderStyle option.

property.name: borderRadius
property.description: Gets or sets the BorderRadius option.

property.name: opacity
property.description: Gets or sets the Opacity option.

property.name: visibility
property.description: Gets or sets the Visibility option.

property.name: shadow
property.description: Gets or sets the Shadow option.

property.name: style
property.description: Gets or sets the Style option.

property.name: dataContext
property.description: Gets or sets the DataContext option.

property.name: inactiveBackgroundColor
property.description: Gets or sets the InactiveBackgroundColor when no alarm is active.

property.name: dateFormat
property.description: Gets or sets the DateFormat.

property.name: timeFormat
